docs.title: Future Home of The Division 2 - Item database
docs.text:
We have decided to put together a website that will allow folks to view information about the armour, weapons, talents, mods, and gear attributes of items in The Division 2. We started discussing this project as something to do whilst the servers were down because of the Year 5 Season 1 update.

Special thanks to the Ahmed and Ruben that have worked upon this Google Spreadsheet, you inspired us to do this. Our mini-project would not be possible without your efforts! Thanks a million!
